title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: It is then carried through Glenfarg,a romantic valley enclosed b}' the Ochils,to the Bridge of Earn, famed for its mineral wells, and over Moncrieffe Hill, aff'ording one of the finest views of the Carse of Gowrie.

title: St. Andrews and elsewhere;
author: Boyd, Andrew Kennedy Hutchison
snippet: Through historic Killiecrankie : and now from Perth to Edinburgh by beautiful Glenfarg, and the miraculous Forth Bridge.
